Mount_Vernon.Henry F. Spaulding Coachman's House: Henry F. Spaulding Coachman's House is a historic home located at Riverdale, The Bronx in New York, New York. It was built about 1880 and is representative of the Stick-Eastlake style. The main section is a ​2 1⁄2-story cottage dwelling with board and batten siding.
